strategy_reasoning: Gamifying the changelog into an 'Inventory Update' or 'Patch Notes' fits the retro RPG aesthetic perfectly. It turns dry technical commits into exciting game mechanics, making the platform feel like a living world that just leveled up.

images.prompt: Cozy pixel art title screen. A cute 8-bit bee mascot hovering over an open treasure chest glowing with soft light. Background is a lush pixel garden with lime green (#ecf874) leaves and pastel flowers. Retro game text box at the bottom says 'WEEKLY LOOT'. Warm sunlight, soft shadows, lo-fi aesthetic like Stardew Valley. Nostalgic and welcoming.
images.description: Intro slide establishing the 'Loot Drop' theme for the updates.

images.prompt: Pixel art interior scene of a cozy retro gamer room. On a wooden desk, a chunky CRT monitor displays a crisp, high-resolution pixel landscape (representing unified video). Next to it, a magical quill is writing on a floating scroll (representing Scribe v2). Soft lime green (#ecf874) glow from the screen. Pastel colors, isometric view, Unpacking game vibes.
images.description: Visualizing the Video Resolution and Scribe v2 updates as room upgrades.

images.prompt: Close up pixel art of a magical inventory slot. A glowing potion bottle labeled 'GLM 5' filled with shimmering lime green (#ecf874) liquid. Sparkles and 'Level Up' arrows floating around it. Soft pastel gradient background. Chunky pixels, retro RPG style. Represents the model upgrade.
images.description: The GLM 5 upgrade visualized as a mana potion or stat boost.

images.prompt: Pixel art scene of a tiny builder character painting a UI panel with a large pixel brush. The panel is changing colors to match a flower icon (representing the tier color fix). In the background, a sturdy bridge is being reinforced (Node 22/23 fix). Soft lime green (#ecf874) grass, sunny sky. Wholesome, constructive vibes.
images.description: Visualizing the bug fixes and UI polish as maintenance work.

alt_text: A carousel of cozy pixel art images. 1. A bee mascot with a treasure chest. 2. A retro computer room showing video and audio tools. 3. A magical potion bottle labeled GLM 5. 4. A tiny character painting a UI panel. All in soft lime green and pastel colors.
